creator: Polygloss Languages
descriptionHtml:
You can practice any language you want! As long as there is at least one other player to practice with you, with Polygloss you can develop skills not only in common languages such as French, German, English and Italian, but also in uncommon languages, rare dialects, indigenous languages and other minority languages such as Norwegian, Scots Gaelic and Quechua.

Polygloss is a first-class app for improving your language production and fluency using state-of-the-art cognitive science research. Polygloss is designed for those stuck at an intermediary level who have trouble finding challenging resources to keep self-studying but still struggle to learn by jumping into full conversations with other speakers.

* Image and task based lessons give you something to talk about
* Send and receive feedback on your lessons
* Get randomly matched with other players
* Or add people as friends and practice only with them
* Collect stars and progress through rich tree of lessons

Coming soon!
* See your favorite bookmarked sentences
* See how many words you have used so far in the game

Polygloss is a Game With a Purpose, meaning that by playing Polygloss, you're not only practicing a language but also helping advance research in computational linguistics.

----------------
Polygloss is a work in progress
Join the newsletter at https://polygloss.app

Questions or bug reports?
https://instagram.com/polyglossapp
https://twitter.com/polyglossapp
https://github.com/Etiene/polygloss_public/issues
etiene@polygloss.app

----------------

FAQ

Q: How many languages are available?
A: All of them

Q: Really?
A: Yes. Any. As long as there is another player playing the same language, the game will pair both of you. You can add your own made up language and play with a friend if you want.
descriptionShort: Practice languages with Polygloss!

As long as there is at least one other player to practice with you, with Polygloss you can develop skills not only in common languages such as French, German, English and Italian, but also in uncommon languages, rare dialects, indigenous languages and other minority languages such as Norwegian, Scots Gaelic and Quechua.

Polygloss is a first-class app for improving your language production and fluency using state-of-the-art cognitive science research. Polygloss is designed for those stuck at an intermediary level who have trouble finding challenging resources to keep self-studying but still struggle to learn by jumping into full conversations with other speakers.

* Image and task based lessons give you something to talk about
* Send and receive feedback on your lessons
* Get randomly matched with other players
* Or add people as friends and practice only with them
* Collect stars and progress through rich tree of lessons

Coming soon!
* See your favorite bookmarked sentences
* See how many words you have used so far in the game

Polygloss is a Game With a Purpose, meaning that by playing Polygloss, you're not only practicing a language but also helping advance research in computational linguistics.

----------------
Polygloss is a work in progress
Join the newsletter at https://polygloss.app

Questions or bug reports?

etiene@polygloss.app

----------------

FAQ

A: All of them

title: Polygloss

creator: Polygloss Languages
descriptionHtml:
Are you feeling stuck in the "I can understand but I can't speak" part of your language journey? Despite all you've learned so far, do you feel you can't communicate? Look no more, Polygloss is right for you!

Guess images with friends, write creatively and increase your active vocabulary! Available for 40+ languages. Ideal for A2-B2.

Do you find chatting with others too challenging or stressful to give you results?

Playing a guessing game that offers you sufficient interaction, guidance and lets you express yourself with freedom is the best solution to improve your commucation in another language without stress.

* Image based lessons give you something to talk about
* Receive feedback and improve your writing
* Add people as friends or get randomly paired with other players
* Collect stars and progress through dozens of topics
* Bookmark your favorite sentences for later study
* No right or wrong or useless sentences, say what you want to say!

Coming soon:
* See how big is your vocabulary
* Play with audio
* Get word and sentence tips

----------------
Polygloss is a work in progress
Join the newsletter at https://polygloss.app

Questions or bug reports?
https://instagram.com/polyglossapp
https://twitter.com/polyglossapp
etiene@polygloss.app

----------------
FAQ

Q. What languages are available?
A. All of them! But it needs at least one other player in the same language so you can play together.

Q. Is the app free?
A. Yes. There is an option to pay for a premium subscription with extra features.

Q. How does it work?
A. Polygloss' focus is communication. Have you ever experienced the stage "I can understand lots of things, but I can't express myself"? This happens when our passive vocabulary is much bigger than our active vocabulary. We can recognize many words when we encounter them, but can't recall them when we need. There are different ways of increasing the active vocabulary. One of them is intense repetition. Depending on the system we use, we are often not in control of what vocabulary gets repeated, and if we are only consuming books and series, sometimes the vocabulary we need to learn gets repeated only once or twice. It needs a lot more repetition and effort to really know a word. If we are using flashcards, depending on how we create the cards, we might be missing context as the cards don't change with every turn, and not be learning collocations.

Another way of increasing your active vocabulary is simply using the words. When we want to say something, we are dealing with vocabulary that we care about and we have the opportunity to notice what we can't say and improve it. It is normal to get more exposure to language than creating language, but like any other skill, creating language needs to be nurtured. You can't learn how to ride a bike just by reading about it. These methods are ranked by depth of vocabulary processing:

1. Writing your own composition
2. Writing a sentence using given words
3. Reading a sentence and filling the gap of the missing word
4. Reading and looking up words
5. Reading

Polygloss is currently based on the first one, and we are expanding to include the second one soon.

Q. Why are you creating this?

A. I'm a Software Engineer from Brazil, who studied in France, did my final year project in Germany, went to the UK for work, and now am moving to Spain! I have learned many languages throughout this journey and I love doing that just for fun as well. I started developing Polygloss because of my own frustrations learning German, frustrations with the materials and market solutions I tried, and with how generally hard it is to overcome the intermediate plateau in any language. It's a vast market but many solutions are available only to beginners, and just chatting with natives can be very stressful unless your level is advanced. So I went ahead, started deeply researching the topic, got another masters degree, and came up with a solution that has really shown results.

It's a vast market but many solutions are available only to beginners, and just chatting with natives can be very stressful unless your level is advanced. So I went ahead, started deeply researching the topic, got another masters degree, and came up with a solution that has really shown results.

title: Polygloss

creator: Polygloss Languages
descriptionHtml:
Are you feeling stuck in the "I can understand but I can't speak" part of your language journey? Despite all you've learned so far, do you feel you can't communicate? Look no more, Polygloss is right for you!

Guess images with friends, write creatively and increase your active vocabulary! Available for 40+ languages. Ideal for A2-B2.

Do you find chatting with others too challenging or stressful to give you results?

Playing a guessing game that offers you sufficient interaction, guidance and lets you express yourself with freedom is the best solution to improve your commucation in another language without stress.

* Image based lessons give you something to talk about
* Receive feedback and improve your writing
* Add people as friends or get randomly paired with other players
* Collect stars and progress through dozens of topics
* Bookmark your favorite sentences for later study
* No right or wrong or useless sentences, say what you want to say!

Coming soon:
* See how big is your vocabulary
* Play with audio
* Get word and sentence tips

----------------
Polygloss is a work in progress
Join the newsletter at https://polygloss.app

Questions or bug reports?
https://instagram.com/polyglossapp
https://twitter.com/polyglossapp
etiene@polygloss.app

----------------
FAQ

Q. What languages are available?
A. All of them! But it needs at least one other player in the same language so you can play together.

Q. Is the app free?
A. Yes. There is an option to pay for a premium subscription with extra features.

Q. How does it work?
A. Polygloss' focus is communication. Have you ever experienced the stage "I can understand lots of things, but I can't express myself"? This happens when our passive vocabulary is much bigger than our active vocabulary. We can recognize many words when we encounter them, but can't recall them when we need. There are different ways of increasing the active vocabulary. One of them is intense repetition. Depending on the system we use, we are often not in control of what vocabulary gets repeated, and if we are only consuming books and series, sometimes the vocabulary we need to learn gets repeated only once or twice. It needs a lot more repetition and effort to really know a word. If we are using flashcards, depending on how we create the cards, we might be missing context as the cards don't change with every turn, and not be learning collocations.

Another way of increasing your active vocabulary is simply using the words. When we want to say something, we are dealing with vocabulary that we care about and we have the opportunity to notice what we can't say and improve it. It is normal to get more exposure to language than creating language, but like any other skill, creating language needs to be nurtured. You can't learn how to ride a bike just by reading about it. These methods are ranked by depth of vocabulary processing:

1. Writing your own composition
2. Writing a sentence using given words
3. Reading a sentence and filling the gap of the missing word
4. Reading and looking up words
5. Reading

Polygloss is currently based on the first one, and we are expanding to include the second one soon.

Q. Why are you creating this?

A. I'm a Software Engineer from Brazil, who studied in France, did my final year project in Germany, went to the UK for work, and now am moving to Spain! I have learned many languages throughout this journey and I love doing that just for fun as well. I started developing Polygloss because of my own frustrations learning German, frustrations with the materials and market solutions I tried, and with how generally hard it is to overcome the intermediate plateau in any language. It's a vast market but many solutions are available only to beginners, and just chatting with natives can be very stressful unless your level is advanced. So I went ahead, started deeply researching the topic, got another masters degree, and came up with a solution that has really shown results.

title: Polygloss

creator: Polygloss Languages
descriptionHtml:
Are you feeling stuck in the "I can understand but I can't speak" part of your language learning journey? Despite all you've learned so far, do you feel you can't communicate? Look no more, Polygloss is right for you!

★ Guess images with friends.
★ Write creatively and increase your active vocabulary!
★ Available for 40+ languages for FREE.(English, French, Spanish, German, Portuguese, Italian, Norwegian, Greek, Japanese, Dutch, Chinese, Welsh, Russian, Arabic, Esperanto, and many more)
★ Ideal for motivated beginners and intermediate language learners (A2-B2). Not recommended for complete beginners.
★ Works really well alongside popular language learning apps like Duolingo.

For most language learners, moving from ‘understanding’ to ‘communicating’ is difficult. Those first conversations are stressful and don’t get any results.

This is where Polygloss comes in. Our mission is to help language learners be independent and enjoy life using a foreign language.

How do we do it?

Polygloss is an image guessing game that offers you sufficient interaction, guidance and lets you express yourself with freedom. Using new words, in your own personal context, is the best method for increasing your vocabulary. Better than simply reading, re-reading and memorizing words out of context!
Polygloss works, is science-backed, and was awarded best paper* at the 9th NLP4CALL workshop series at The University of Gothenburg.

Why does it work?
It is normal for language learners to experience more language exposure than language creation. Language creation is hard and needs to be nurtured.

There are different ways to increase your active vocabulary (words that you have the ability to use, not just understand). This includes intense repetition, consuming content you enjoy (books, series, movies), flashcards, etc. These methods are great and should be part of any language learners tool kit.

But, there is another way to increase your active vocabulary. Simply by using words. Ideally in your own personalized context.

And that’s why Polygloss works. It allows you to start communicating in a low stress environment. Helping you easily increase your active vocabulary and communication confidence.

Ready to make the jump from understanding to communicating? Download Polygloss today.

Features:

🖼 Image based lessons give you something to talk about.
🙌 No translation required! Use words you know to describe what you see.
😌 Low stress opportunity to creatively use your target language.
✍ Receive feedback and improve your writing.
🤍 Add people as friends or get randomly paired with other players.
⭐ Collect stars and progress through dozens of topics.
🏆 Compete with other learners in optional daily writing challenges.
📖 Bookmark your favorite sentences and corrections for later study.
📣 No right, wrong or useless sentences. Say what you want to say!
👌 Get word and sentence tips (Available only in English, Spanish, French, German, Portuguese, and Italian. New languages and levels coming soon!)
👏 All minority and dialect languages possible. As long as you have a partner, you can play!

Coming soon:
🚀 See your vocabulary and learning stats.
🔊 Play with audio.
🎮 Review with mini games.

--
Polygloss is a work in progress
Join the newsletter at https://polygloss.app

Questions, suggestions or bug reports?
https://instagram.com/polyglossapp
https://twitter.com/polyglossapp
etiene@polygloss.app

--
FAQ

Q. What languages are available?
A. All of them! But it needs at least one other player in the same language so you can play together. Don’t forget to invite your friends!

Q. Is the app free?
A. Yes. There is an option to pay for a premium subscription with extra features, but all of the content is freely accessible.

Q. Is there a web version?
A. Not yet! After the iOS version is successful, we will evaluate creating a web version.

--
Privacy Policy: https://polygloss.app/privacy/

*Link to award: https://tinyurl.com/m8jhf2w

title: Polygloss: Express yourself in another language

creator: Polygloss Languages
descriptionHtml:
Are you feeling stuck in the "I can understand but I can't speak" part of your language learning journey? Despite all you've learned so far, do you feel you can't communicate? Look no more, Polygloss is right for you!

★ Guess images with friends.
★ Write creatively and increase your active vocabulary!
★ Available for 40+ languages for FREE.(English, French, Spanish, German, Portuguese, Italian, Norwegian, Greek, Japanese, Dutch, Chinese, Welsh, Russian, Arabic, Esperanto, and many more)
★ Ideal for motivated beginners and intermediate language learners (A2-B2). Not recommended for complete beginners.
★ Works really well alongside popular language learning apps like Duolingo.

For most language learners, moving from ‘understanding’ to ‘communicating’ is difficult. Those first conversations are stressful and don’t get any results.

This is where Polygloss comes in. Our mission is to help language learners be independent and enjoy life using a foreign language.

How do we do it?

Polygloss is an image guessing game that offers you sufficient interaction, guidance and lets you express yourself with freedom. Using new words, in your own personal context, is the best method for increasing your vocabulary. Better than simply reading, re-reading and memorizing words out of context!
Polygloss works, is science-backed, and was awarded best paper* at the 9th NLP4CALL workshop series at The University of Gothenburg.

Why does it work?
It is normal for language learners to experience more language exposure than language creation. Language creation is hard and needs to be nurtured.

There are different ways to increase your active vocabulary (words that you have the ability to use, not just understand). This includes intense repetition, consuming content you enjoy (books, series, movies), flashcards, etc. These methods are great and should be part of any language learners tool kit.

But, there is another way to increase your active vocabulary. Simply by using words. Ideally in your own personalized context.

And that’s why Polygloss works. It allows you to start communicating in a low stress environment. Helping you easily increase your active vocabulary and communication confidence.

Ready to make the jump from understanding to communicating? Download Polygloss today.

Features:

🖼 Image based lessons give you something to talk about.
🙌 No translation required! Use words you know to describe what you see.
😌 Low stress opportunity to creatively use your target language.
✍ Receive feedback and improve your writing.
🤍 Add people as friends or get randomly paired with other players.
⭐ Collect stars and progress through dozens of topics.
🏆 Compete with other learners in optional daily writing challenges.
📖 Bookmark your favorite sentences and corrections for later study.
📣 No right, wrong or useless sentences. Say what you want to say!
👌 Get word and sentence tips (Available only in English, Spanish, French, German, Portuguese, and Italian. New languages and levels coming soon!)
👏 All minority and dialect languages possible. As long as you have a partner, you can play!

Coming soon:
🚀 See your vocabulary and learning stats.
🔊 Play with audio.
🎮 Review with mini games.

--
Polygloss is a work in progress
Join the newsletter at https://polygloss.app

https://twitter.com/polyglossapp
etiene@polygloss.app

--

Q. What languages are available?
A. All of them! But it needs at least one other player in the same language so you can play together. Don’t forget to invite your friends!

A. Yes. There is an option to pay for a premium subscription with extra features, but all of the content is freely accessible.

Q. Is there a web version?
A. Not yet! After the iOS version is successful, we will evaluate creating a web version.

title: Polygloss: Express yourself in another language

creator: Polygloss Languages
descriptionHtml:
Are you feeling stuck in the "I can understand but I can't speak" part of your language learning journey? Despite all you've learned so far, do you feel you can't communicate? Look no more, Polygloss is right for you!

★ Guess images with friends.
★ Write creatively and increase your active vocabulary!
★ Available for 40+ languages for FREE.(English, French, Spanish, German, Portuguese, Italian, Norwegian, Greek, Japanese, Dutch, Chinese, Welsh, Russian, Arabic, Esperanto, and many more)
★ Ideal for motivated beginners and intermediate language learners (A2-B2). Not recommended for complete beginners.
★ Works really well alongside popular language learning apps like Duolingo.

For most language learners, moving from ‘understanding’ to ‘communicating’ is difficult. Those first conversations are stressful and don’t get any results.

This is where Polygloss comes in. Our mission is to help language learners be independent and enjoy life using a foreign language.

How do we do it?

Polygloss is an image guessing game that offers you sufficient interaction, guidance and lets you express yourself with freedom. Using new words, in your own personal context, is the best method for increasing your vocabulary. Better than simply reading, re-reading and memorizing words out of context!
Polygloss works, is science-backed, and was awarded best paper* at the 9th NLP4CALL workshop series at The University of Gothenburg.

Why does it work?
It is normal for language learners to experience more language exposure than language creation. Language creation is hard and needs to be nurtured.

There are different ways to increase your active vocabulary (words that you have the ability to use, not just understand). This includes intense repetition, consuming content you enjoy (books, series, movies), flashcards, etc. These methods are great and should be part of any language learners tool kit.

But, there is another way to increase your active vocabulary. Simply by using words. Ideally in your own personalized context.

And that’s why Polygloss works. It allows you to start communicating in a low stress environment. Helping you easily increase your active vocabulary and communication confidence.

Ready to make the jump from understanding to communicating? Download Polygloss today.

Features:

🖼 Image based lessons give you something to talk about.
🙌 No translation required! Use words you know to describe what you see.
😌 Low stress opportunity to creatively use your target language.
✍ Receive feedback and improve your writing.
🤍 Add people as friends or get randomly paired with other players.
⭐ Collect stars and progress through dozens of topics.
🏆 Compete with other learners in optional daily writing challenges.
📖 Bookmark your favorite sentences and corrections for later study.
📣 No right, wrong or useless sentences. Say what you want to say!
👌 Get word and sentence tips (Available only in English, Spanish, French, German, Portuguese, and Italian. New languages and levels coming soon!)
👏 All minority and dialect languages possible. As long as you have a partner, you can play!

Coming soon:
🚀 See your vocabulary and learning stats.
🔊 Play with audio.
🎮 Review with mini games.

--
Polygloss is a work in progress

For most language learners, moving from ‘understanding’ to ‘communicating’ is difficult. Those first conversations are stressful and don’t get any results.

This is where Polygloss comes in. Our mission is to help language learners be independent and enjoy life using a foreign language.

How do we do it?

Polygloss is an image guessing game that offers you sufficient interaction, guidance and lets you express yourself with freedom. Using new words, in your own personal context, is the best method for increasing your vocabulary. Better than simply reading, re-reading and memorizing words out of context!
Polygloss works, is science-backed, and was awarded best paper* at the 9th NLP4CALL workshop series at The University of Gothenburg.

Why does it work?
It is normal for language learners to experience more language exposure than language creation. Language creation is hard and needs to be nurtured.

There are different ways to increase your active vocabulary (words that you have the ability to use, not just understand). This includes intense repetition, consuming content you enjoy (books, series, movies), flashcards, etc. These methods are great and should be part of any language learners tool kit.

But, there is another way to increase your active vocabulary. Simply by using words. Ideally in your own personalized context.

And that’s why Polygloss works. It allows you to start communicating in a low stress environment. Helping you easily increase your active vocabulary and communication confidence.

Ready to make the jump from understanding to communicating? Download Polygloss today.

Are you feeling stuck in the "I can understand but I can't speak" part of your language learning journey? Despite all you've learned so far, do you feel you can't communicate? Look no more, Polygloss is right for you!

★ Guess images with friends.
★ Write creatively and increase your active vocabulary!
★ Ideal for motivated beginners and intermediate language learners (A2-B2). Not recommended for complete beginners.
★ Works really well alongside popular language learning apps like Duolingo.
★ Available for 80+ languages for FREE. (English, Spanish, French, German, Italian, Welsh, Hebrew, Icelandic, Vietnamese, Russian, Arabic, Norwegian, Greek, Japanese, Korean, Mandarin, Dutch, Polish, Finnish, Portuguese, Esperanto, Toki Pona, and many more)


For most language learners, moving from ‘understanding’ to ‘communicating’ is difficult. Those first conversations are stressful and don’t get any results.

This is where Polygloss comes in. Our mission is to help language learners be independent and enjoy life using a foreign language.

How do we do it?

Polygloss is an image guessing game that offers you sufficient interaction, guidance and lets you express yourself with freedom. Using new words, in your own personal context, is the best method for increasing your vocabulary. Better than simply reading, re-reading and memorizing words out of context!
Polygloss works, is science-backed, and was awarded best paper* at the 9th NLP4CALL workshop series at The University of Gothenburg.

Why does it work?
It is normal for language learners to experience more language exposure than language creation. Language creation is hard and needs to be nurtured.

There are different ways to increase your active vocabulary (words that you have the ability to use, not just understand). This includes intense repetition, consuming content you enjoy (books, series, movies), flashcards, etc. These methods are great and should be part of any language learners tool kit.

But, there is another way to increase your active vocabulary. Simply by using words. Ideally in your own personalized context.

And that’s why Polygloss works. It allows you to start communicating in a low stress environment. Helping you easily increase your active vocabulary and communication confidence.

Ready to make the jump from understanding to communicating? Download Polygloss today.

Features:

🖼 Image based lessons give you something to talk about.
🙌 No translation required! Use words you know to describe what you see.
😌 Low stress opportunity to creatively use your target language.
✍ Receive feedback and improve your writing.
🤍 Add people as friends or get randomly paired with other players.
⭐ Collect stars and progress through dozens of topics.
🏆 Compete with other learners in optional daily writing challenges.
📖 Bookmark your favorite sentences and corrections for later study.
📣 No right, wrong or useless sentences. Say what you want to say!
👌 Get word and sentence tips (Available only in English, Spanish, French, German, Portuguese, and Italian. New languages and levels coming soon!)
👏 All minority and dialect languages possible. As long as you have a partner, you can play!

Coming soon:
🚀 See your vocabulary and learning stats.
🔊 Play with audio.
🎮 Review with mini games.

--
Polygloss is a work in progress
Join the newsletter at https://polygloss.app

Questions, suggestions or bug reports?
https://instagram.com/polyglossapp
https://twitter.com/polyglossapp
etiene@polygloss.app

--
FAQ

Q. What languages are available?
A. All of them! But it needs at least one other player in the same language so you can play together. Don’t forget to invite your friends!

Q. Is the app free?
A. Yes. There is an option to pay for a premium subscription with extra features, but all of the content is freely accessible.

--
Privacy Policy: https://polygloss.app/privacy/
Terms of Service: https://polygloss.app/terms/

creator: Polygloss Languages
descriptionHtml:
Are you feeling stuck in the "I can understand but I can't speak" part of your language learning journey? Despite all you've learned so far, do you feel you can't communicate? Look no more, Polygloss is right for you!

★ Guess images with friends.
★ Write creatively and increase your active vocabulary!
★ Ideal for motivated beginners and intermediate language learners (A2-B2). Not recommended for complete beginners.
★ Works really well alongside popular language learning apps like Duolingo.
★ Available for 80+ languages: English, Spanish, French, German, Italian, Welsh, Hebrew, Icelandic, Vietnamese, Russian, Arabic, Norwegian, Greek, Japanese, Korean, Mandarin, Dutch, Polish, Finnish, Portuguese, Esperanto, Toki Pona, and many more


For most language learners, moving from ‘understanding’ to ‘communicating’ is difficult. Those first conversations are stressful and don’t get any results.

This is where Polygloss comes in. Our mission is to help language learners be independent and enjoy life using a foreign language.

How do we do it?

Polygloss is an image guessing game that offers you sufficient interaction, guidance and lets you express yourself with freedom. Using new words, in your own personal context, is the best method for increasing your vocabulary. Better than simply reading, re-reading and memorizing words out of context!
Polygloss works, is science-backed, and was awarded best paper* at the 9th NLP4CALL workshop series at The University of Gothenburg.

Why does it work?
It is normal for language learners to experience more language exposure than language creation. Language creation is hard and needs to be nurtured.

There are different ways to increase your active vocabulary (words that you have the ability to use, not just understand). This includes intense repetition, consuming content you enjoy (books, series, movies), flashcards, etc. These methods are great and should be part of any language learners tool kit.

But, there is another way to increase your active vocabulary. Simply by using words. Ideally in your own personalized context.

And that’s why Polygloss works. It allows you to start communicating in a low stress environment. Helping you easily increase your active vocabulary and communication confidence.

Ready to make the jump from understanding to communicating? Download Polygloss today.

Features:

🖼 Image based lessons give you something to talk about.
🙌 No translation required! Use words you know to describe what you see.
😌 Low stress opportunity to creatively use your target language.
✍ Receive feedback and improve your writing.
